game1.name: Click the Clown
game1.description:
This is the first game I made. I simply follwed a 
 good tutorial that showed me how to do it. They provided 
 all of the images and taught me how to implement them. You 
 literally just try to click the clown, and he gets faster 
 and faster. There is no other objective.

game2.name: Green Cube
game2.description:
Follow the very short adventure of Green Cube as he escapes 
 a lava filled cave. He has to move quickly and avoid all the obstacles. Use your arrow 
 keys to move around and use your mouse to click on ?s. Some of the sources for pictures are:
 http://www.wondermondo.com/Hawaii.htm 
 http://www.zmescience.com/science/geology/how-caves-form/ 
 http://kuzma-prutkoff.livejournal.com/453701.html
